artist: Hashiguchi Goyō; Distributed by Watanabe Shōzaburō; Carved by Takano Shichinosuke; Printed by Somekawa Kanzō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: landscape; falling snow on mountains in background; trees at edges of river, center
inscription: 大正九年一月 {Taishō kunen ichigatsu} (January 1920)
markings: LLC, red date seal: 大正庚申歳 {Taishō kanoe sarudoshi} (Taishō, year of the monkey) (with figure of monkey) | LRC, red publisher seal: ワタナベ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Snow on Mount Ibuki
